title: Chase Ink Plus 70,000 Point Sign-up Bonus – Amazing Deal Alert The Points Guy

type_specific.selection: Chase has just launched a limited-time sign-up offer for the Ink Plus card, where you’ll earn 70,000 points when you spend $5,000 in 3 months. That’s 40% higher than the normal sign-up bonus of 50,000 points, so if you’ve been holding off on getting this card, now is the time to do it. Previously this offer was only […]
